deduction_content: 弹（蹬、蹬）腿由腰到伸摆动小于45° - The kicking leg does not transit from obvious bent (45° or more) to completely straight

questions.question: What is the error code for Tán Tuí (Snap/Spring Kick)?
What is the main deduction point for Tán Tuí?
questions.answer: A deduction is applied when the kicking leg does not transit from obvious bent (45° or more) to completely straight.

questions.question: What is the minimum angle requirement for the kicking leg in Tán Tuí?
questions.answer: The kicking leg must bend at least 45° before transitioning to completely straight.

questions.question: What is the correct execution of Tán Tuí?
questions.answer: The kicking leg should transition from an obviously bent position (45° or more) to completely straight in a snapping motion.
